channel.title: Projects on Vision 2π
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Vision 2π

item.title: Visual Odometry with a Single-Camera Stereo Omnidirectional System
item.description: An extension of the generalized unified model (GUM) originally applied to a single omnidirectional view.

item.title: Direct Multichannel Tracking
item.description: An extension of the semi-dense visual odometry (camera pose tracking) originally applied to a single grayscale image by the state-of-the-art Large-Scale Direct (LSD) SLAM.

item.title: GUMS: Generalized Unified Model for Stereo Omnidirectional Vision
item.description: An extension of the generalized unified model (GUM) originally applied to a single omnidirectional view.

item.title: Single-Camera Omnistereo Sensor for Quadrotor Micro Aerial Vehicles (MAVs)
item.description: A novel omnidirectional stereo sensor using a pair of hyperbolic mirrors and a single camera.

item.title: CATA
item.description: In 2011, a new intelligent ground vehicle CATA (City Autonomous Transportation Agent) was rebuilt to employ the ROS framework to participate in IGVC.

item.title: CityALIEN
item.description: In 2010, our intelligent ground vehicle CityALIEN participated and won the IGVC Design Challenge.

item.title: Machine Learning Project - Multidimensional Classification using LUTs
item.description: The goal of this school project was to design a labeled two class data set of 10-dimensional vectors that has test set classification accuracy less than 60% on some popular classifiers. However, our decision rule was designed such that it can perform with greater than 90% accuracy on the test set.
